General.Name: InVision Aktiengesellschaft
General.Description: InVision Aktiengesellschaft, together with its subsidiaries, develops and markets products and services in the field of workforce management and education in Europe and the United States. The company offers products, such as injixo, a cloud-based workforce management software to optimize workforce planning process; and The Call Center School, a cloud-based e-learning solution. InVision Aktiengesellschaft was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Düsseldorf, Germany.
